An Act To AMEND THE Rusprn ResRaRce Chapter $2. Onpivance. Si [Date of Assent: September 1, 1951.)

BE it enacted by the King's Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows: —
4. This Act may be cited as the Rubber Research short tise. {Amendment) Act, No, 30 of 1951. .

2. Section 2 of the Rubber Research Ordinance is Ammdmesr of hereby amended by the substitution, for the word inne, “* managing *’, of the words "* establishing and main- taining 2 rubber research institution and otherwise managing ".
